Description: 1988 Kramer Nightswan Up for sale is a super cool and incredibly rare USA built 1988 Kramer Nightswan in its original Lightning finish. Designed and built for Vivian Campbell of Whitesnake, Dio and more recently Def Leppard, the Nightswan is absolutely one of the most desirable and well-built instruments from the 1980s era line of Kramer guitars. Overall in good to very good condition less a few deep dings on the face of the body as well as some surface scratches and play wear. This guitar was played but not abused by who we believe was an original owner. Entirely original and professionally setup in-house. This thing shreds!! The back plate has been removed but is included along-side the original hard case. Don't miss out on this cool and rare Kramer. Year: 1988.Model: NightswanSerial: F6259.Finish: Lightning.Case: Original hardshell case.Weight: 7lbs. 15oz.Condition: Very good condition less a few deep dings on the face and regular play wear.Modifications: None.Comments: Super cool and very rare '88 Nightswan in its original Lightning finish!
